name: SSCS
description:
SSCS is a game where you take the role of a simple cargo sorter in a huge corporation. You will have to sort the cargo by weight, fragility and content. The game includes several locations, each of which has its own characteristics and unique elements of the game experience, and they change every 5 game days. The abundance of cargo types will not let you get bored for a while, and the pleasant atmosphere will allow you to relax.

Key Features:
  • Multiple game locations
  • More than 30 different cargos
  • Pleasant atmosphere
